projects.name: Bomber Pandas
projects.description: A bomberman clone, 2D maze-like player vs player game with custom sprites and CSS

projects.name: Pokemon Team Builder
projects.description: A website that lets users build their dream pokemon teams and save them to their profile for future use. Users can also search a database of all Pokemon including their statistics, movesets, weaknesses, etc.

projects.name: forSale
projects.description: A community driven market single page web application where users can list their items and exchange sales in a physical location

projects.name: News Search
projects.description: A single page web application that reports top and current news articles with the ability to save and like articles

projects.name: Portfolio Site
projects.description: Wanted to try out GatsbyJS and decided to build my portfolio site with it!
